h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ kusalaṃ ^a^T5.0529^ea^ ^a^M5.0001^ea^ ^a^V5.0001^ea^ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ nakusalaṃ ^a^T6.0001^ea^ ^a^M5.0063^ea^ ^a^V5.0075^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- akusalaṃ abyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca akusalā abyākatā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ...pe0... dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ. nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nābyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca nābyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca nākusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. pañca.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ nākusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nākusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nākusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nābyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ^a^T6.0002^ea^. nākusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo ca nābyākato ca dhammā ^a^V5.0076^ea^ uppajjanti hetupaccayā. nākusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca nākusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. pañca.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ nābyākataṃ ^a^M5.0064^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca nābyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nābyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nābyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nābyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca nābyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. nābyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo ca nābyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. nābyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca nākusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. cha.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ nakusalañca nābyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nakusalañca nābyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nakusalañca nābyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nābyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nakusalañca nābyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca nābyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. nakusalañca nābyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca nākusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. pañca.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ nākusalañca nābyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati ^a^T6.0003^ea^ hetupaccayā. nākusalañca nābyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nākusalañca nābyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nābyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nākusalañca nābyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo ca nābyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. nākusalañca nābyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca nākusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. pañca.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ ^a^T6.0052^ea^ ^a^M5.0105^ea^ ^a^V5.0125^ea^ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- nahetuṃ akusalaṃ abyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ. nahetuṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetuṃ nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- nahetū akusale abyākate khandhe paṭicca hetū. nahetuṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nakusalo ca nanahetu nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. [03] 1^b^.^eb^ nakusalaṃ ^a^T6.0091^ea^ ^a^M5.0139^ea^ ^a^V5.0162^ea^ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nakusalaṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nakusalaṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nābyākato nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nakusalaṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nābyākato nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. nakusalaṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nākusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (5)

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ nākusalaṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nākusalaṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nākusalaṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nābyākato nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ^a^M5.0140^ea^ ^a^V5.0163^ea^ dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nākusalaṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nābyākato nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. nākusalaṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nākusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (5)

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ nābyākataṃ ^a^T6.0092^ea^ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nābyākato nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nābyākataṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nābyākataṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nābyākataṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nābyākato nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. nābyākataṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nābyākato nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. nābyākataṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nākusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. [03] 1^b^.^eb^ kusalaṃ ^a^T6.0135^ea^ ^a^M5.0173^ea^ ^a^V5.0198^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- kusale khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ...pe0... kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nābyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā...pe0... kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo ca nābyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā -- kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā...pe0... kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca nākusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā -- kusale khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (5)

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- akusale khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- akusalaṃ ekaṃ ^a^T6.0136^ea^ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ...pe0... akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ^a^V5.0199^ea^ nābyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca nābyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca nākusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (5)

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ abyākataṃ ^a^M5.0174^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- vipākābyākataṃ kiriyābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā...pe0... dve mahābhūte paṭicca dve mahābhūtā, mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- vipākābyākataṃ...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... mahābhūtaṃ...pe0... abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca nākusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā -- vipākābyākataṃ kiriyābyākataṃ...pe0.... (3) (saṃkhittaṃ.)

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ kusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- kusale khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. kusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. kusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca nākusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. [03] 11^b^.^eb^ hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā sattarasa, anantare soḷasa, samanantare soḷasa, sahajāte ekūnavīsa, aññamaññe nava, nissaye chabbīsa, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, purejāte cha, pacchājāte nava, āsevane nava, kamme terasa, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre terasa...pe0... magge terasa, sampayutte nava, vippayutte dvādasa...pe0... avigate chabbīsa. (pañhāvāraṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ sukhāya ^a^M5.0177^ea^ vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- sukhāya vedanāya sampayutte khandhe paṭicca sukhavedanā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... (mahābhūtā natthi). sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ...pe0... sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. sukhāya ^a^V5.0203^ea^ vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nādukkhamasukhāya ^a^T6.0141^ea^ vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (7)

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā ^a^T6.0142^ea^ uppajjanti hetupaccayā. dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ^a^M5.0178^ea^ ca nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (7)

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ^a^V5.0204^ea^ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (7) (saṃkhittaṃ.)
[03] hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe ekavīsa...pe0... avigate ekavīsa.
[03] 15^b^.^eb^ sukhāya ^a^T6.0143^ea^ vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (saṃkhittaṃ.)

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ^a^M5.0179^ea^ dhammo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nadukkhāya vedanāya ^a^V5.0205^ea^ sampayuttassa ca nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo ^a^T6.0144^ea^. [03] 17^b^.^eb^ vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo ca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko ca navipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (pañca pañhā.)

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko ca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko ca navipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (pañca pañhā.)

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ ^a^M5.0180^ea^ ^a^V5.0206^ea^ paṭicca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca ^a^T6.0145^ea^ navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo ca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko ca navipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (pañca pañhā.)

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ vipākañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. vipākañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. vipākañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. vipākañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo ca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. vipākañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko ca navipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (5)

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ vipāko dhammo navipākassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. vipāko dhammo navipākadhammadhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. vipāko dhammo nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. vipāko dhammo navipākadhammadhammassa ca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. vipāko dhammo navipākassa ca navipākadhammadhammassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. [03] 25^b^.^eb^ hetuyā ^a^T6.0148^ea^ ^a^M5.0182^ea^ terasa, ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā sattarasa, anantare soḷasa...pe0... purejāte cha, pacchājāte nava, āsevane cha, kamme cuddasa, vipāke pañca, indriye aṭṭhārasa...pe0... vippayutte dvādasa...pe0... avigate chabbīsa. [03] 26^b^.^eb^ upādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. upādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. upādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānupādinnānupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. upādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinnupādāniyo ca nānupādinnānupādāniyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. upādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānupādinnupādāniyo ca nānupādinnānupādāniyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (5)

(3)

[01] anupādinnānupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānupādinnānupādāniyo ^a^T6.0149^ea^ dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anupādinnānupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anupādinnānupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anupādinnānupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinnupādāniyo ca nānupādinnānupādāniyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. anupādinnānupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinnupādāniyo ca nānupādinnupādāniyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (5)

[03] anupādinnupādāniyañca anupādinnānupādāniyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anupādinnupādāniyañca anupādinnānupādāniyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nānupādinnānupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anupādinnupādāniyañca anupādinnānupādāniyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinnupādāniyo ca nānupādinnānupādāniyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)

[03] upādinnupādāniyañca anupādinnupādāniyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. upādinnupādāniyañca anupādinnupādāniyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nānupādinnānupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. upādinnupādāniyañca anupādinnupādāniyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinnupādāniyo ^a^M5.0183^ea^ ca nānupādinnānupādāniyo ^a^T6.0150^ea^ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3) (saṃkhittaṃ.)

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ ^a^V5.0211^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nāsaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nāsaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca nāsaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nāsaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca nāsaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā ^a^T6.0152^ea^. (5)

[03] asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nāsaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca nāsaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. [03] 38^b^.^eb^ ācayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nāacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ācayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nāpacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ācayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanevācayagāmināpacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ācayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nāpacayagāmī ca nanevācayagāmināpacayagāmī ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. ācayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nāacayagāmī ca nāpacayagāmī ^a^T6.0158^ea^ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. [03] nahetuṃ avitakkāvicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nāvitakkāvicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 15^b^.^eb^ hetuṃ pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] hetuṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 16^b^.^eb^ hetuṃ ^a^M5.0219^ea^ dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] hetuṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nahetuṃ ^a^V5.0251^ea^ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nanahetu nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 17^b^.^eb^ hetuṃ dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[01] hetuṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ^a^T6.0193^ea^ dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] hetuṃ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] 18^b^.^eb^ hetuṃ ācayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nāacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[01] hetuṃ apacayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nāpacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] hetuṃ mahaggatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu namahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... (tīṇi).

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ hetuṃ maggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu namaggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... (tīṇi).

[01] hetu uppādī dhammo nahetussa nauppādissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... ārammaṇe nava.
[03] 26^b^.^eb^ hetu atīto dhammo nahetussa nātītassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... ārammaṇe nava.

[01] hetuṃ anāgatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nānāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ hetuṃ ajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nājjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... (tīṇi).

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ nahetu sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nanahetussa nasanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo...pe0... nahetu sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nahetussa nasanidassanasappaṭighassa ca nanahetussa nasanidassanasappaṭighassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.
[03] nahetuṃ ^a^T6.0197^ea^ anidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nānidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ...pe0... avigate ekaṃ.

[03] hetuṃ ^a^V5.0255^ea^ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nānidassanāppaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nahetuṃ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nānidassanāppaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuṃ anidassanāppaṭighañca nahetuṃ anidassanāppaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nānidassanāppaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (3) hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 30^b^.^eb^ sahetukaṃ ^a^M5.0223^ea^ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.

[03] ahetukaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nāhetuko nābyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] 31^b^.^eb^ hetusampayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetusampayutto nakusalo ^a^T6.0198^ea^ dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.

[03] hetuvippayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nahetuvippayutto nābyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ hetu ceva sahetuko ca kusalo dhammo nahetussa ceva nāhetukassa ca nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. hetu ceva sahetuko ca kusalo dhammo nāhetukassa ceva nana ca hetussa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. hetu ceva sahetuko ^a^V5.0256^ea^ ca kusalo dhammo nahetussa ceva nāhetukassa ca nakusalassa ca nāhetukassa ceva nana ca hetussa nakusalassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] sahetuko ceva na ca hetu kusalo dhammo nāhetukassa ceva nana ca hetussa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. sahetuko ceva na ca hetu kusalo dhammo nahetussa ceva nāhetukassa ca nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. sahetuko ^a^M5.0224^ea^ ceva na ca hetu kusalo dhammo nahetussa ceva nāhetukassa ca nakusalassa ca nāhetukassa ceva nana ca hetussa nakusalassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[01] hetu ceva sahetuko kusalo ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu kusalo ^a^T6.0199^ea^ ca dhammā nahetussa ceva nāhetukassa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. hetu ceva sahetuko kusalo ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu kusalo ca dhammā nāhetukassa ceva nana ca hetussa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. hetu ceva sahetuko kusalo ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu kusalo ca dhammā nahetussa ceva nāhetukassa nakusalassa ca nāhetukassa ceva nana hetussa nakusalassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] ārammaṇe nava.
[03] 33^b^.^eb^ hetu ceva sahetuko ca akusalo dhammo nahetussa ceva nāhetukassa nākusalassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (etena upāyena nava pañhā kātabbā.)

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ hetu ceva sahetuko ca abyākato dhammo nahetussa ceva nāhetukassa ca nābyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (nava pañhā kātabbā.) (saṃkhittaṃ, hetuhetusampayuttadukaṃ hetusahetukadukasadisaṃ. saṃkhittaṃ. nava pañhā.)

[03] 65^b^.^eb^ sukhāya ^a^T6.0255^ea^ vedanāya sampayuttaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā...pe0... satta pañhā.

[03] 67^b^.^eb^ vipākaṃ ^a^V5.0304^ea^ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. vipākaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. vipākaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. vipākaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo nahetu ca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. vipākaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko nahetu ca navipākadhammadhammo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. pañca.

[03] vipākadhammadhammaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. vipākadhammadhammaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. vipākadhammadhammaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. vipākadhammadhammaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko ^a^M5.0267^ea^ nahetu ca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. vipākadhammadhammaṃ hetuṃ ^a^T6.0257^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko nahetu ca navipākadhammadhammo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. pañca.

[03] nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko nahetu ca navipākadhammadhammo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. tīṇi... hetuyā terasa.

[03] 68^b^.^eb^ vipākaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. vipākaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. vipākaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo nanahetu ca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. tīṇi.

[03] vipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. vipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ^a^V5.0305^ea^. vipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko nanahetu ca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. tīṇi.

[03] nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ ^a^T6.0258^ea^ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā...pe0.... nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko nanahetu ca navipākadhammadhammo nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā... pañca.
[03] vipākaṃ nahetuñca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi... hetuyā cuddasa.

[03] 69^b^.^eb^ upādinnupādāniyaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinnupādāniyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. upādinnupādāniyaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānupādinnupādāniyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. upādinnupādāniyaṃ ^a^M5.0268^ea^ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānupādinnānupādāniyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. upādinnupādāniyaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinnupādāniyo nahetu ca nānupādinnānupādāniyo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. upādinnupādāniyaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānupādinnupādāniyo nahetu ca nānupādinnānupādāniyo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti ^a^T6.0259^ea^ hetupaccayā. pañca.
[03] anupādinnupādāniyaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinnupādāniyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi.
[03] anupādinnānupādāniyaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānupādinnānupādāniyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... pañca... hetuyā terasa.
[03] 70^b^.^eb^ upādinnupādāniyaṃ ^a^V5.0306^ea^ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānupādinnupādāniyo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi... hetuyā nava.
[03] 71^b^.^eb^ saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā terasa.
[03] saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nāsaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi... hetuyā nava.
[03] 72^b^.^eb^ savitakkasavicāraṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā pannarasa.
[03] savitakkasavicāraṃ ^a^T6.0260^ea^ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nāvitakkavicāramatto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā aṭṭhavīsa.
[03] 73^b^.^eb^ pītisahagataṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca napītisahagato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā aṭṭhavīsa.
[03] pītisahagataṃ ^a^M5.0269^ea^ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā aṭṭhārasa {hetuyā aṭṭha?}.
[03] 74^b^.^eb^ dassanena pahātabbaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā terasa.
[03] dassanena ^a^V5.0307^ea^ pahātabbaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] 75^b^.^eb^ dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ^a^T6.0261^ea^ nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā soḷasa.
[03] dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] 76^b^.^eb^ ācayagāmiṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nāacayagāmī nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā terasa.
[03] ācayagāmiṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nāpacayagāmī nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] 77^b^.^eb^ sekkhaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasekkho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā terasa.
[03] sekkhaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nāsekkho nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] 78^b^.^eb^ parittaṃ ^a^T6.0262^ea^ ^a^M5.0270^ea^ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namahaggato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā terasa.
[03] parittaṃ ^a^V5.0308^ea^ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naparitto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cuddasa.
[03] 79^b^.^eb^ parittārammaṇaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naparittārammaṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ekavīsa.
[03] parittārammaṇaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namahaggatārammaṇo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] 80^b^.^eb^ hīnaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahīno nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā terasa.
[03] hīnaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namajjhimo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati ^a^T6.0263^ea^ hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] 81^b^.^eb^ micchattaniyataṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namicchattaniyato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā terasa.
[03] micchattaniyataṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasammattaniyato nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] 82^b^.^eb^ maggārammaṇaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namaggārammaṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā pañcavīsa.
[03] maggārammaṇaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namaggahetuko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā terasa {hetuyā aṭṭha?}.

[03] 83^b^.^eb^ uppanno ^a^M5.0271^ea^ ^a^V5.0309^ea^ hetu dhammo nānupannassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. uppanno hetu dhammo nauppādissa ^a^T6.0264^ea^ nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. uppanno hetu dhammo nānuppannassa nahetussa ca nauppādissa nahetussa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] 84^b^.^eb^ paccuppanno hetu dhammo nātītassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. paccuppanno hetu dhammo nānāgatassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. paccuppanno hetu dhammo nātītassa nahetussa ca nānāgatassa nahetussa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 85^b^.^eb^ atītārammaṇaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nātītārammaṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ekavīsa.
[03] atītārammaṇaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānāgatārammaṇo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.

[03] 86^b^.^eb^ ajjhattaṃ ^a^T6.0265^ea^ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabahiddhā nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. bahiddhā hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nājjhatto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā dve.
[03] ajjhattaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabahiddhā nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. bahiddhā nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nājjhatto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā dve.
[03] 87^b^.^eb^ ajjhattārammaṇaṃ ^a^V5.0310^ea^ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nājjhattārammaṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[03] ajjhattārammaṇaṃ ^a^M5.0272^ea^ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabahiddhārammaṇo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā dve.

[03] 88^b^.^eb^ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anidassanāppaṭighaṃ ^a^T6.0266^ea^ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā...pe0... anidassanāppaṭighaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu ca nānidassanasappaṭigho nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.

[03] 89^b^.^eb^ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anidassanāppaṭighaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanasappaṭigho nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anidassanāppaṭighaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanahetu ca nānidassanasappaṭigho nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] 90^b^.^eb^ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anidassanāppaṭighaṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā...pe0... anidassanāppaṭighaṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasahetuko ca nānidassanasappaṭigho nasahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā... hetuyā ^a^T6.0267^ea^ cha.
[03] anidassanāppaṭighaṃ ^a^V5.0311^ea^ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nāhetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (saṃkhittaṃ.) hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] 91^b^.^eb^ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anidassanāppaṭighaṃ ^a^M5.0273^ea^ hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā...pe0... anidassanāppaṭighaṃ hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetusampayutto ca nānidassanasappaṭigho nahetusampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[03] anidassanāppaṭighaṃ hetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 92^b^.^eb^ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho ^a^T6.0268^ea^ nahetu ceva nāhetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] anidassanāppaṭighaṃ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nāhetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 93^b^.^eb^ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] anidassanāppaṭighaṃ hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 94^b^.^eb^ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ ^a^V5.0312^ea^ nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho ^a^T6.0269^ea^ nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[03] anidassanāppaṭighaṃ ^a^M5.0274^ea^ nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu nāhetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 95^b^.^eb^ anidassanāppaṭigho appaccayo dhammo nasanidassanasappaṭighassa nāppaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
[03] ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi, upanissaye tīṇi. (saṃkhittaṃ.)

[03] 96^b^.^eb^ sanidassanasappaṭigho nasanidassano dhammo nasanidassanasappaṭighassa nasanidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (saṃkhittaṃ.) ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi, upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.
[03] anidassanasappaṭighaṃ anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanasappaṭigho nānidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.

[03] 97^b^.^eb^ anidassanasappaṭighaṃ sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanasappaṭigho nasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anidassanasappaṭighaṃ sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anidassanasappaṭighaṃ sappaṭighaṃ ^a^V5.0313^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasappaṭigho ca nānidassanasappaṭigho nasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] anidassanāppaṭighaṃ ^a^T6.0270^ea^ appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho nāppaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anidassanāppaṭighaṃ appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nāppaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā...pe0... anidassanāppaṭighaṃ appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanasappaṭigho nāppaṭigho ca nānidassanāppaṭigho nāppaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā... hetuyā pañca.
[03] 98^b^.^eb^ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ ^a^M5.0275^ea^ rūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho narūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] anidassanāppaṭighaṃ arūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho nārūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anidassanāppaṭighaṃ arūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nārūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā...pe0... anidassanāppaṭighaṃ arūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nārūpī ca nānidassanasappaṭigho nārūpī ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[03] 99^b^.^eb^ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho nalokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... (saṃkhittaṃ). hetuyā tīṇi... avigate tīṇi.
[03] anidassanāppaṭighaṃ ^a^T6.0271^ea^ lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.

[03] 100^b^.^eb^ anidassanasappaṭighaṃ ^a^V5.0314^ea^ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanasappaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anidassanasappaṭighaṃ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anidassanasappaṭighaṃ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā...pe0... anidassanasappaṭighaṃ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo ca nānidassanasappaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā... cha.
[03] anidassanāppaṭighaṃ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... cha.

[03] anidassanasappaṭighaṃ kenaci viññeyyañca anidassanāppaṭighaṃ kenaci viññeyyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati ^a^T6.0272^ea^ hetupaccayā... cha... hetuyā aṭṭhārasa.
[03] anidassanasappaṭighaṃ ^a^M5.0276^ea^ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā aṭṭhārasa.

[03] 101^b^.^eb^ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anidassanāppaṭighaṃ āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā...pe0... anidassanāppaṭighaṃ āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho noāsavo ca nānidassanasappaṭigho noāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.

[03] anidassanāppaṭighaṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati ^a^V5.0315^ea^ hetupaccayā. anidassanāppaṭighaṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanasappaṭigho nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anidassanāppaṭighaṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanoāsavo ca nānidassanasappaṭigho nanoāsavo ^a^T6.0273^ea^ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] 102^b^.^eb^ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anidassanāppaṭighaṃ sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nānidassanasappaṭigho nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anidassanāppaṭighaṃ sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasāsavo ca nānidassanasappaṭigho nasāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] anidassanāppaṭighaṃ anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho nānāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anidassanāppaṭighaṃ anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nānāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā...pe0.... anidassanāppaṭighaṃ anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nānāsavo ca nānidassanasappaṭigho nānāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.

[03] 103^b^.^eb^ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ ^a^M5.0277^ea^ āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho ^a^T6.0274^ea^ nāasavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anidassanāppaṭighaṃ āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nāasavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā...pe0... anidassanāppaṭighaṃ āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nāasavasampayutto ca nānidassanasappaṭigho nāasavasampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[03] anidassanāppaṭighaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nāasavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] 104^b^.^eb^ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ ^a^V5.0316^ea^ āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho nāasavo ceva nānāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anidassanāppaṭighaṃ āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nāasavo ceva nānāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā...pe0... anidassanāppaṭighaṃ āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nāasavo ceva nānāsavo ca nānidassanasappaṭigho nāasavo ceva nānāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti ^a^T6.0275^ea^ hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.

[03] anidassanāppaṭighaṃ sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nānāsavo ceva nanoāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anidassanāppaṭighaṃ sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanasappaṭigho nānāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anidassanasappaṭighaṃ sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nānāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo nānidassanasappaṭigho nānāsavo ceva nano āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] 142^b^.^eb^ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ pariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho napariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] anidassanāppaṭighaṃ ^a^V5.0327^ea^ apariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho nāpariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anidassanāppaṭighaṃ apariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nāpariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā...pe0... anidassanāppaṭighaṃ apariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nāpariyāpanno ca nānidassanasappaṭigho nāpariyāpanno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[03] 143^b^.^eb^ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ niyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho naniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ^a^T6.0293^ea^ cha.
[03] anidassanāppaṭighaṃ aniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho nāniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 144^b^.^eb^ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ niyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[03] anidassanāppaṭighaṃ aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho nāniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 145^b^.^eb^ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ sauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] anidassanāppaṭighaṃ anuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho nānuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[03] 146^b^.^eb^ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ ^a^T6.0294^ea^ ^a^M5.0288^ea^ ^a^V5.0328^ea^ saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[03] anidassanāppaṭighaṃ araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho nāraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] 147^b^.^eb^ sanidassanasappaṭigho araṇo dhammo nasanidassanasappaṭighassa nāraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ kusalaṃ ^a^M5.0289^ea^ ^a^V5.0329^ea^ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. kusalaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā...pe0... kusalaṃ sukhāya vedanāya ^a^T6.0295^ea^ sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nākusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. pañca.

[03] akusalaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. akusalaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā...pe0... akusalaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nākusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. pañca.

[03] abyākataṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. abyākataṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo nasukhāya vedanāya ^a^M5.0290^ea^ sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. abyākataṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ ^a^V5.0330^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nākusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. tīṇi. (saṃkhittaṃ.)
[03] hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava...pe0... avigate terasa.
[03] 2^b^.^eb^ abyākataṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā ^a^T6.0296^ea^... tīṇi.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ kusalaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati nāarammaṇapaccayā. kusalaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati nāarammaṇapaccayā. kusalaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nākusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti nāarammaṇapaccayā. tīṇi.
[03] akusalaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati nāarammaṇapaccayā... tīṇi.

[01] abyākataṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati nāarammaṇapaccayā. abyākataṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati nāarammaṇapaccayā. abyākataṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nākusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti nāarammaṇapaccayā. tīṇi.

[03] nahetupaccayā ^a^T6.0297^ea^ ^a^V5.0331^ea^ ārammaṇe tīṇi.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ kusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nakusalassa nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo...pe0....
[03] ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa. (pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ akusalaṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. akusalaṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā...pe0... akusalaṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nākusalo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe cha...pe0... avigate aṭṭha.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ abyākataṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. abyākataṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. abyākataṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nadukkhāya ^a^T6.0298^ea^ vedanāya sampayutto ca nākusalo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā.
[03] nahetuyā tīṇi. (sahajātavārampi...pe0... pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ kusalaṃ ^a^V5.0332^ea^ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (saṃkhittaṃ.) hetuyā terasa. (sabbattha vitthāro).

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ kusalaṃ vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. kusalaṃ vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. kusalaṃ vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo navipākadhammadhammo ca nākusalo navipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. tīṇi.

[03] akusalaṃ vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. akusalaṃ vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. akusalaṃ vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca ^a^T6.0299^ea^ nakusalo navipākadhammadhammo ca nākusalo navipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. [03] 11^b^.^eb^ abyākataṃ nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. abyākataṃ nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. abyākataṃ nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo ca nākusalo nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ abyākataṃ upādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. abyākataṃ upādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. abyākataṃ upādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ^a^V5.0333^ea^ naupādinnupādāniyo ca nākusalo naupādinnupādāniyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ akusalaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] abyākataṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nābyākato ^a^T6.0301^ea^ nāsaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. abyākataṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nakusalo nāsaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. abyākataṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nākusalo nāsaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. abyākataṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nakusalo nāsaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca nābyākato nāsaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. abyākataṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nākusalo nāsaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ^a^V5.0334^ea^ ca nābyākato nāsaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. abyākataṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nakusalo nāsaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca nākusalo nāsaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. hetuyā cha.
[03] 16^b^.^eb^ kusalaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nāsaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi.
[03] abyākataṃ ^a^M5.0294^ea^ asaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nāsaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi... hetuyā cha.

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ kusalaṃ pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... pañca... hetuyā terasa.

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ akusalaṃ dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] akusalaṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ^a^T6.0303^ea^ tīṇi.
[03] abyākataṃ ^a^M5.0295^ea^ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nābyākato nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 20^b^.^eb^ akusalaṃ dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] akusalaṃ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ^a^T6.0304^ea^ tīṇi.

[03] kusalaṃ apacayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nāpacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ kusalaṃ sekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (dve mūlāni.)... hetuyā cha.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ akusalaṃ hīnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo nahīno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] abyākataṃ ^a^T6.0307^ea^ aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nābyākato nāniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā pañca.

[03] kusalaṃ maggādhipatiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo namaggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[03] 28^b^.^eb^ kusalo anuppanno dhammo nakusalassa nānuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa. (uppādī anuppannasadisaṃ.)
[03] 29^b^.^eb^ kusalo ^a^T6.0308^ea^ atīto dhammo nakusalassa nātītassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
[03] ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa. (anāgataṃ atītasadisaṃ.)
[03] 30^b^.^eb^ kusalaṃ atītārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nātītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] kusalaṃ ^a^M5.0298^ea^ ^a^V5.0339^ea^ anāgatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nānāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] kusalaṃ paccuppannārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo napaccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] 31^b^.^eb^ kusalo ajjhatto dhammo nājjhattassa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (saṃkhittaṃ.)... ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa.
[03] kusalo bahiddhā dhammo nabahiddhā nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (saṃkhittaṃ.)... ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa.
[03] 32^b^.^eb^ kusalaṃ ajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nājjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ^a^T6.0309^ea^ nava.
[03] kusalaṃ bahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] 33^b^.^eb^ abyākato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nābyākatassa nasanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... ārammaṇe cha. (tīṇi veditakaṃ kātabbaṃ.)

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ abyākataṃ anidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo nānidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. abyākataṃ anidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo nānidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. abyākataṃ anidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ^a^V5.0340^ea^ nakusalo nānidassanasappaṭigho ca nākusalo nānidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ kusalaṃ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nānidassanāppaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. kusalaṃ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo nānidassanāppaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ^a^M5.0299^ea^. kusalaṃ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ^a^T6.0310^ea^ nānidassanāppaṭigho ca nākusalo nānidassanāppaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. tīṇi.

[03] akusalaṃ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo nānidassanāppaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. akusalaṃ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nānidassanāppaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. akusalaṃ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nānidassanāppaṭigho ca nākusalo nānidassanāppaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. tīṇi.

[03] abyākataṃ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nānidassanāppaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. abyākataṃ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nākusalo nānidassanāppaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. abyākataṃ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nānidassanāppaṭigho ca nākusalo nānidassanāppaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. tīṇi.
[03] kusalaṃ anidassanāppaṭighañca abyākataṃ anidassanāppaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nānidassanāppaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi.
[03] akusalaṃ anidassanāppaṭighañca abyākataṃ anidassanāppaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nānidassanāppaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi... hetuyā pannarasa.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ sukhāya ^a^T6.0311^ea^ ^a^V5.0341^ea^ vedanāya sampayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā ^a^M5.0300^ea^. sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. satta.
[03] adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... satta... hetuyā ^a^T6.0312^ea^ cuddasa.
[03] 37^b^.^eb^ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... satta.
[03] dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nākusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... satta.
[03] adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nākusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... satta. (ekavīsati pañhā.)
[03] 38^b^.^eb^ sukhāya ^a^V5.0342^ea^ vedanāya sampayutto abyākato dhammo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa nābyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (saṃkhittaṃ.)
[03] ārammaṇe ekavīsati. (dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttābyākatamūlaṃ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttābyākatamūlampi kātabbaṃ.)
[03] 39^b^.^eb^ vipākadhammadhammaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] vipākadhammadhammaṃ ^a^M5.0301^ea^ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo nākusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ ^a^T6.0313^ea^ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo nābyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 40^b^.^eb^ anupādinnupādāniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinnupādāniyo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi.
[03] anupādinnānupādāniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānupādinnānupādāniyo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi hetuyā cha.
[03] anupādinnupādāniyaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinnupādāniyo nākusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] upādinnupādāniyaṃ ^a^V5.0343^ea^ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naupādinnupādāniyo nābyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā pañca.
[03] 41^b^.^eb^ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ^a^T6.0314^ea^ nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi.
[03] asaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nāsaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesiko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi... hetuyā cha.
[03] saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko nākusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi.
[03] asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nāsaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko nābyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... (saṃkhittaṃ.) hetuyā cha...pe0... avigate cha.
[03] 42^b^.^eb^ savitakkasavicāraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi.
[03] avitakkavicāramattaṃ ^a^M5.0302^ea^ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nāvitakkavicāramatto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā pannarasa.
[03] savitakkasavicāraṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro nākusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] 43^b^.^eb^ pītisahagataṃ ^a^V5.0344^ea^ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca napītisahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... satta.
[03] sukhasahagataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhasahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... satta.
[03] upekkhāsahagataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... satta ^a^T6.0315^ea^. (vedanāttikasadisaṃ. saṃkhittaṃ.)

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anidassanāppaṭighaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā...pe0... anidassanāppaṭighaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo ca nānidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.

[03] anidassanāppaṭighaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho nākusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anidassanāppaṭighaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā...pe0... anidassanāppaṭighaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo ca nānidassanasappaṭigho nākusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā (saṃkhittaṃ.) hetuyā cha...pe0... avigate cha.

[03] anidassanāppaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho nābyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anidassanāppaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nānidassanasappaṭigho nābyākato ^a^T6.0316^ea^ dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ^a^M5.0303^ea^. anidassanāppaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho ^a^V5.0345^ea^ nābyākato ca nānidassanasappaṭigho nābyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi...pe0... avigate tīṇi.
[03] 45^b^.^eb^ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[03] anidassanāppaṭighaṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[03] anidassanāppaṭighaṃ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[03] 46^b^.^eb^ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho ^a^T6.0317^ea^ navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[03] anidassanāppaṭighaṃ vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[03] anidassanāppaṭighaṃ nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 47^b^.^eb^ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ upādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.

[03] sanidassanasappaṭigho anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo nasanidassanasappaṭighassa nānupādinnupādāniyassa ^a^V5.0346^ea^ dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... (saṃkhittaṃ.) ^a^M5.0304^ea^ ārammaṇe nava, anantare tīṇi...pe0... upanissaye purejāte nava...pe0... avigate nava.
[03] anidassanāppaṭighaṃ anupādinnānupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho nānupādinnānupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[03] 48^b^.^eb^ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ ^a^T6.0318^ea^ saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[03] anidassanāppaṭighaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho nāsaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] anidassanāppaṭighaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho nāsaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[03] 49^b^.^eb^ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ savitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho nasavitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[03] anidassanāppaṭighaṃ avitakkavicāramattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho ^a^T6.0319^ea^ nāvitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[03] anidassanāppaṭighaṃ avitakkāvicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nāvitakkāvicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 50^b^.^eb^ anidassanāppaṭighaṃ ^a^V5.0347^ea^ ajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho nājjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.

[03] anidassanāppaṭighaṃ ^a^M5.0305^ea^ bahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanāppaṭigho nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anidassanāppaṭighaṃ bahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. anidassanāppaṭighaṃ bahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nānidassanasappaṭigho nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā...pe0... anidassanāppaṭighaṃ bahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nabahiddhārammaṇo ca nānidassanasappaṭigho nabahiddhārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. hetuyā ^a^T6.0320^ea^ cha...pe0... avigate cha. (pañhāvāraṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
[06] dhammānulomapaccanīye tikatikapaṭṭhānaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ hetuṃ ^a^M5.0307^ea^ ^a^V5.0348^ea^ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuṃ sahetukañca nahetuṃ sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (saṃkhittaṃ.) hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ...pe0... avigate pañca.
[03] 2^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā... (saṃkhittaṃ.) nahetuyā ekaṃ, nāarammaṇe tīṇi...pe0... novigate tīṇi.
[03] (sahajātavārampi...pe0... sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)
[03] 3^b^.^eb^ hetu sahetuko dhammo nahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] hetu sahetuko dhammo nahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. hetu sahetuko dhammo nanahetussa nasahetukassa ^a^T6.0321^ea^ ^a^M5.0308^ea^ dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. hetu sahetuko dhammo ^a^V5.0349^ea^ nahetussa nasahetukassa ca nanahetussa nasahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] nahetu sahetuko dhammo nanahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetussa nasahetukassa ca nanahetussa nasahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (3) (saṃkhittaṃ.)
[03] hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā dve...pe0... avigate pañca. (pañhāvāraṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
[03] 4^b^.^eb^ hetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nāhetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
[03] nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nāhetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi. (saṃkhittaṃ.) hetuyā cattāri.
[03] 5^b^.^eb^ hetuṃ hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi. (sahetukasadisaṃ.)
[03] hetuṃ hetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
[03] nahetuṃ hetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ ^a^T6.0322^ea^ paṭicca nanahetu nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi. hetuyā cattāri.
[03] 6^b^.^eb^ hetuṃ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nahetu ceva nāhetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] nahetuṃ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nāhetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] 7^b^.^eb^ hetuṃ ^a^M5.0309^ea^ ^a^V5.0350^ea^ hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] nahetuṃ hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] 8^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nahetu nasahetuko ^a^T6.0323^ea^ dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā adhipatiyā ekaṃ.
