[03] nakusalo ca nābyākato ca dhammā kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. nakusalo ca nābyākato ca dhammā akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. nakusalo ca nābyākato ca dhammā abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. tīṇi.

[03] nākusalo ca nābyākato ca dhammā kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. nākusalo ca nābyākato ca dhammā akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. nākusalo ca nābyākato ca dhammā abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. tīṇi.
[03] nakusalo ^a^M5.0331^ea^ ca nākusalo ca dhammā kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi. (saṃkhittaṃ.)
[03] 9^b^.^eb^ hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā tevīsa...pe0... avigate dvāvīsa. (pañhāvāraṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ nasukhāya ^a^T6.0358^ea^ vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (3)

[03] nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ^a^V5.0374^ea^ dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (3)

[03] nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (3) (saṃkhittaṃ.) hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa...pe0... avigate ekavīsa.
[03] 11^b^.^eb^ navipākaṃ ^a^T6.0359^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. navipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca vipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... pañca.
[01] navipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. navipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi.

[03] nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ ^a^M5.0332^ea^ paṭicca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... pañca. hetuyā dvāvīsa.
[03] 12^b^.^eb^ naupādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi.
[01] nānupādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... pañca.
[01] nānupādinnānupādāniyaṃ ^a^V5.0375^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi.
[01] naupādinnupādāniyañca nānupādinnānupādāniyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.
[01] nānupādinnupādāniyañca nānupādinnānupādāniyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca upādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi.
[03] naupādinnupādāniyañca nānupādinnupādāniyañca ^a^T6.0360^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinnānupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi. hetuyā aṭṭhārasa.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca asaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. tīṇi.
[03] nāsaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... pañca.

[03] nāsaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nāsaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ^a^M5.0333^ea^ dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nāsaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. tīṇi. hetuyā aṭṭhārasa.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ nasavitakkasavicāraṃ ^a^V5.0376^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasavitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasavitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkāvicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... satta.
[03] nāvitakkavicāramattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... satta.
[03] nāvitakkāvicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ^a^T6.0361^ea^ avitakkāvicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... satta. hetuyā ekūnapaññāsa.
[03] 15^b^.^eb^ napītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... cattāri.
[03] nasukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... cattāri.
[03] naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... cattāri. hetuyā aṭṭhavīsa.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbo ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. tīṇi.

[03] nabhāvanāya ^a^M5.0334^ea^ ^a^V5.0377^ea^ pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. tīṇi.

[03] nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena ^a^T6.0362^ea^ pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... pañca. (saṃkhittaṃ.) hetuyā aṭṭhārasa.
[03] 17^b^.^eb^ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā chabbīsa.
[03] 18^b^.^eb^ nāacayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca apacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā aṭṭhārasa.
[03] 19^b^.^eb^ nasekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā aṭṭhārasa.
[03] 20^b^.^eb^ naparittaṃ ^a^V5.0378^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca paritto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā dvāvīsa.
[03] 21^b^.^eb^ naparittārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā terasa.
[03] 22^b^.^eb^ nahīnaṃ ^a^T6.0363^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā aṭṭhārasa.
[03] 23^b^.^eb^ namicchattaniyataṃ ^a^M5.0335^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā aṭṭhārasa.
[03] 24^b^.^eb^ namaggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā dasa {hetuyā aṭṭha?}.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ nānuppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. nauppādī dhammo uppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. nānuppanno ca nauppādī ca dhammā uppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ nātīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. nānāgato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. nātīto ca nānāgato ca dhammā paccuppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. hetuyā ^a^T6.0364^ea^ tīṇi.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ nātītārammaṇaṃ ^a^V5.0379^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nātītārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nātītārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. tīṇi.
[03] nānāgatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nānāgatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. dve.

[03] napaccuppannārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. napaccuppannārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. napaccuppannārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. tīṇi. (saṃkhittaṃ.) hetuyā sattarasa.
[03] 28^b^.^eb^ nājjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.
[03] nabahiddhā ^a^M5.0336^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ. hetuyā dve.
[03] 29^b^.^eb^ nājjhattārammaṇaṃ ^a^T6.0365^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... dve.
[03] nabahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... dve.
[03] nājjhattārammaṇañca nabahiddhārammaṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... dve. hetuyā cha.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ ^a^V5.0380^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho ca anidassanāppaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho ca anidassanāppaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho ca anidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho ca anidassanasappaṭigho ca anidassanāppaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. satta.

[01] nānidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati ^a^T6.0366^ea^ hetupaccayā. nānidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... satta.
[03] nānidassanāppaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... satta. hetuyā pañcatiṃsa. (pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)
[06] dhammapaccanīyānulome tikapaṭṭhānaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ ^a^M5.0337^ea^ ^a^V5.0381^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)

[03] nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)

[03] nahetuñca nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nahetuñca nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nahetuñca nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti ^a^T6.0367^ea^ hetupaccayā. (3) (saṃkhittaṃ.) hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava...pe0... avigate nava.
[03] (sahajātavārampi...pe0... pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ nasahetukaṃ ^a^V5.0382^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. tīṇi.

[03] nāhetukaṃ ^a^M5.0338^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nāhetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nāhetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. tīṇi.

[03] nasahetukañca nāhetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasahetukañca nāhetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasahetukañca nāhetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. tīṇi. hetuyā nava.
[03] 3^b^.^eb^ nahetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ^a^T6.0368^ea^ nava.
[03] 4^b^.^eb^ nahetuñceva nāhetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] 5^b^.^eb^ nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] 6^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] 7^b^.^eb^ nāppaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] 8^b^.^eb^ nāsaṅkhataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṅkhato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ^a^T6.0369^ea^ ekaṃ.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanaṃ ^a^V5.0383^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasanidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasanidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassano ca anidassano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassano ^a^M5.0339^ea^ dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. nānidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ nasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ ^a^T6.0370^ea^ paṭicca sappaṭigho ca appaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. tīṇi.

[03] nāppaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nāppaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nāppaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho ca appaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. tīṇi.
[03] nasappaṭighañca nāppaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi. hetuyā nava.
[03] 11^b^.^eb^ narūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
[03] nalokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
[03] nalokiyañca ^a^V5.0384^ea^ nalokuttarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1). hetuyā pañca.
[03] 13^b^.^eb^ nakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ nāasavaṃ ^a^T6.0371^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nāasavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nāasavaṃ ^a^M5.0340^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ca noāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. tīṇi.

[03] nanoāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nanoāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nanoāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ca noāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. tīṇi.
[03] nāasavañca nanoāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi. hetuyā nava.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo ca anāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. tīṇi.
[03] nānāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.
[03] nasāsavañca nānāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ. (saṃkhittaṃ.) hetuyā pañca.
[03] 16^b^.^eb^ nāasavasampayuttaṃ ^a^T6.0372^ea^ ^a^V5.0385^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] 17^b^.^eb^ nāasavañceva anāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva sāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] 18^b^.^eb^ nāasavañceva nāasavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] 19^b^.^eb^ āsavavippayuttaṃ nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā pañca.
[03] 20^b^.^eb^ nasaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā...pe0....
[03] naganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā...pe0....
[03] naoghaṃ ^a^M5.0341^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ^a^T6.0373^ea^ ...pe0....
[03] nayogaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca yogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā...pe0....
[03] nanīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā...
[03] 21^b^.^eb^ naparāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā....

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ nasārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. tīṇi.
[01] nānārammaṇaṃ ^a^V5.0386^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi.
[03] nasārammaṇañca nānārammaṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi. hetuyā nava.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ nacittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca citto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nacittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nacittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca citto ca nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. tīṇi.
[03] nanocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.
[03] nacittañca nanocittañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ^a^T6.0374^ea^. ekaṃ. hetuyā pañca.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ nacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. hetuyā nava.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ nacittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nacittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nacittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)

[03] nacittavippayuttaṃ ^a^M5.0342^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nacittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nacittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
[03] nacittasampayuttañca nacittavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi. hetuyā nava.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ nacittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ ^a^T6.0375^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nacittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ ^a^V5.0387^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittavisaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nacittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭho ca cittavisaṃsaṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ nacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ nacittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nacittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nacittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ nacittānuparivattiṃ ^a^T6.0376^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nacittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nacittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittānuparivattī ca nocittānuparivattī ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] 30^b^.^eb^ nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] 31^b^.^eb^ nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] 32^b^.^eb^ nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] 33^b^.^eb^ nājjhattikaṃ ^a^T6.0377^ea^ ^a^M5.0343^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi.
[01] nabāhiraṃ ^a^V5.0388^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi.
[03] nājjhattikañca nabāhirañca dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi. hetuyā nava.
[03] 34^b^.^eb^ naupādā dhammaṃ paṭicca upādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā pañca.
[03] 35^b^.^eb^ naupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā pañca.
[03] 36^b^.^eb^ naupādānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... (saṃkhittaṃ).
[03] 37^b^.^eb^ nakilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... (saṃkhittaṃ).
[03] 38^b^.^eb^ nadassanena ^a^T6.0378^ea^ pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.

[03] nanadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nanadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nanadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo ca nadassanena pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. tīṇi.
[03] nadassanena pahātabbañca nanadassanena pahātabbañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ. hetuyā pañca.
[03] 39^b^.^eb^ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā pañca.
[03] 40^b^.^eb^ nadassanena ^a^M5.0344^ea^ ^a^V5.0389^ea^ pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] 41^b^.^eb^ nabhāvanāya ^a^T6.0379^ea^ pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ nasavitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasavitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasavitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. tīṇi.

[03] nāvitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nāvitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nāvitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)

[03] nasavitakkañca nāvitakkañca dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasavitakkañca nāvitakkañca dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasavitakkañca nāvitakkañca dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3) hetuyā nava.
[03] 43^b^.^eb^ nasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ^a^T6.0380^ea^... hetuyā nava.
[03] 44^b^.^eb^ nasappītikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] 45^b^.^eb^ napītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] 46^b^.^eb^ nasukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ naupekkhāsahagataṃ ^a^V5.0390^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato ca naupekkhāsahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. tīṇi.
[03] nanaupekkhāsahagataṃ ^a^M5.0345^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato ^a^T6.0381^ea^ dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi.

[03] naupekkhāsahagatañca nanaupekkhāsahagatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. naupekkhāsahagatañca nanaupekkhāsahagatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. naupekkhāsahagatañca nanaupekkhāsahagatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato ca naupekkhāsahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. tīṇi. hetuyā nava.

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ nakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kāmāvacaro ca nakāmāvacaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā... tīṇi.
[03] nanakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi.
[03] nakāmāvacarañca nanakāmāvacarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi. hetuyā nava.
[03] 49^b^.^eb^ narūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ^a^T6.0382^ea^ nava.
[03] 50^b^.^eb^ nārūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nārūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā pañca.
[03] 51^b^.^eb^ napariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi.
[03] nāpariyāpannaṃ ^a^V5.0391^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca pariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.
[03] napariyāpannañca nāpariyāpannañca dhammaṃ paṭicca pariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ. hetuyā pañca.
[03] 52^b^.^eb^ naniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.
[03] nāniyyānikaṃ ^a^M5.0346^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi.
[03] naniyyānikañca nāniyyānikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ. hetuyā pañca.
[03] 53^b^.^eb^ naniyataṃ ^a^T6.0383^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.
[03] nāniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi.
[03] naniyatañca nāniyatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ. hetuyā pañca.

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ nasauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sauttaro ca anuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. tīṇi.
[03] nānuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.
[01] nasauttarañca nānuttarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā pañca.
[03] 55^b^.^eb^ nasaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.
[01] nāraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi.
[03] nasaraṇañca ^a^V5.0392^ea^ nāraṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ. hetuyā ^a^T6.0384^ea^ pañca, ārammaṇe dve...pe0... avigate pañca.
[03] 56^b^.^eb^ nasaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. nāraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā (saṃkhittaṃ).
[01] nahetuyā dve, nāarammaṇe tīṇi...pe0... novigate tīṇi.
[03] (sahajātavārampi...pe0... sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)
[03] 57^b^.^eb^ nasaraṇo ^a^M5.0347^ea^ dhammo araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] nāraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. nāraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. nāraṇo dhammo saraṇassa ca araṇassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 58^b^.^eb^ nasaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. nasaraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. dve.
[03] nāraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. nāraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. dve.
[03] 59^b^.^eb^ hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri...pe0... avigate satta.
[03] 60^b^.^eb^ nasaraṇo ^a^V5.0393^ea^ dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo, purejātapaccayena paccayo (saṃkhittaṃ).
[01] nahetuyā ^a^T6.0385^ea^ satta, nāarammaṇe satta...pe0... noavigate cattāri.
[03] (yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
[06] dhammapaccanīyānulome dukapaṭṭhānaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ ^a^M5.0349^ea^ ^a^V5.0394^ea^ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nahetuṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nahetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nahetuṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu kusalo ca nahetu kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nahetuṃ nākusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ nābyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nanahetuṃ nābyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nahetuṃ nābyākatañca nanahetuṃ nābyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ^a^T6.0386^ea^ tīṇi.
[03] 3^b^.^eb^ nasahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] nasahetukaṃ nākusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ nasahetukaṃ ^a^M5.0350^ea^ ^a^V5.0395^ea^ nābyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nāhetukaṃ nābyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasahetukaṃ nābyākatañca nāhetukaṃ nābyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 5^b^.^eb^ nahetusampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā....

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ nahetu ceva nāhetuko ca nakusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. nahetu ceva nāhetuko ca nakusalo dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. nahetu ceva nāhetuko ca nakusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa kusalassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa kusalassa ca dhammassa ^a^T6.0387^ea^ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. tīṇi.
[03] nāhetuko ceva nana ca hetu nakusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.
[03] nahetu ceva nāhetuko nakusalo ca nāhetuko ceva nanahetu nakusalo ca dhammā hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi. (sabbattha nava pañhā.)
[03] 7^b^.^eb^ nahetu ceva nāhetuko ca nākusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo (saṃkhittaṃ, nava pañhā).
[03] nahetu ceva nāhetuko ca nābyākato dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi. (nava pañhā.)
[03] 8^b^.^eb^ nahetu ^a^V5.0396^ea^ ceva nahetuvippayutto ca nakusalo dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo (saṃkhittaṃ, nava pañhā kātabbā).
[03] nahetu ^a^M5.0351^ea^ ceva nahetuvippayutto ca nākusalo dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo (saṃkhittaṃ, nava pañhā kātabbā).
[03] nahetu ^a^T6.0388^ea^ ceva nahetuvippayutto ca nābyākato dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi. (nava pañhā kātabbā.)
[03] 9^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nahetu sahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ nākusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nahetu sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] nahetuṃ nāhetukaṃ nābyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] 10^b^.^eb^ nāppaccayaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sappaccayo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] nāppaccayaṃ nākusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sappaccayo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] nāppaccayaṃ ^a^T6.0389^ea^ ^a^V5.0397^ea^ nābyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaccayo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] 11^b^.^eb^ nāsaṅkhataṃ...pe0... (sappaccayadukasadisaṃ).

[03] nasanidassanaṃ nākusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassano akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.

[03] nāasavasampayuttaṃ nābyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto ^a^T6.0393^ea^ abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] nāasavañceva nānāsavañca nākusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā āsavo ceva sāsavo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] āsavavippayuttaṃ nasāsavaṃ nābyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. āsavavippayuttaṃ nānāsavaṃ nābyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā dve.

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ naupādānaṃ ^a^M5.0357^ea^ nākusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā upādāno akusalo dhammo ^a^T6.0399^ea^ uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 43^b^.^eb^ nakilesaṃ nākusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] nadassanena pahātabbaṃ nākusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nadassanena pahātabbaṃ nākusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā dve.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ nasukhasahagataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sukhasahagato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 53^b^.^eb^ naupekkhāsahagataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā upekkhāsahagato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ^a^T6.0402^ea^ tīṇi.

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ nanakāmāvacaraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nakāmāvacaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nanakāmāvacaraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kāmāvacaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā dve.

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ naniyyānikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā niyyāniko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. naniyyānikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nāniyyāniko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā dve.

[03] 59^b^.^eb^ naniyataṃ ^a^T6.0403^ea^ ^a^M5.0359^ea^ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā niyato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. naniyataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā aniyato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā dve.

[03] 62^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nahetuṃ nasukhāya ^a^T6.0404^ea^ vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nahetuṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nahetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. hetuyā tīṇi. nahetu nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttamūlaṃ tīṇiyeva.
[03] nahetuṃ nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 63^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ navipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nahetuṃ ^a^M5.0360^ea^ navipākadhammadhammaṃ paccayā hetu vipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nahetuṃ nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ nahetu ^a^T6.0405^ea^ naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo hetussa upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. nahetu naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo nahetussa upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. nahetu naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo hetussa upādinnupādāniyassa ^a^V5.0407^ea^ ca nahetussa upādinnupādāniyassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] nanahetu naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo nahetussa upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.
[03] nahetu naupādinnupādāniyo ca nanahetu naupādinnupādāniyo ca dhammā hetussa upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi. (nava pañhā saṃkhittaṃ.)
[03] nahetuṃ nānupādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nahetuṃ nānupādinnānupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu anupādinnānupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 65^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ^a^T6.0406^ea^ dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nahetuṃ nāsaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nahetuṃ nāsaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu asaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 66^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ ^a^M5.0361^ea^ ^a^V5.0408^ea^ nasavitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu savitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nahetuṃ nāvitakkavicāramattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu avitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nahetuṃ nāvitakkāvicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu avitakkāvicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 67^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ napītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nahetuṃ nasukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sukhasahagato dhammo ^a^T6.0407^ea^ uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nahetuṃ naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 68^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nahetuṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] 69^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nevadassanena nabhāvanāya ^a^V5.0409^ea^ pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nanahetuṃ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (dukamūlaṃ ekaṃ saṃkhittaṃ, sabbattha tīṇi.)
[03] 70^b^.^eb^ nanahetuṃ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dassanena ^a^T6.0408^ea^ pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] nanahetuṃ ^a^M5.0362^ea^ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.

[03] 71^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nanahetuṃ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... gaṇitakena tīṇi.
[03] 72^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ nāacayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu ācayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nahetuṃ nāpacayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu apacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] nahetuṃ nanevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nanahetuṃ nanevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī ^a^T6.0409^ea^ dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... gaṇitakena tīṇi.
[03] 73^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ ^a^V5.0410^ea^ nasekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu sekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nahetuṃ nāsekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu asekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] nahetuṃ nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nanahetuṃ nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... gaṇitakena tīṇi.

[03] 74^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ ^a^M5.0363^ea^ naparittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu paritto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nanahetuṃ naparittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu paritto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... gaṇitakena tīṇi.
[03] nahetuṃ namahaggataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu mahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nahetuṃ nāppamāṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu appamāṇo dhammo ^a^T6.0410^ea^ uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 75^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ naparittārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nahetuṃ namahaggatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nahetuṃ ^a^V5.0411^ea^ nāppamāṇārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 76^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ nahīnaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu hīno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nahetuṃ namajjhimaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nanahetuṃ namajjhimaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... gaṇitakena tīṇi.
[01] nahetuṃ napaṇītaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu paṇīto dhammo uppajjati ^a^T6.0411^ea^ hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 77^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ namicchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nahetuṃ ^a^M5.0364^ea^ nasammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nahetuṃ nāniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nanahetuṃ nāniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... gaṇitakena tīṇi.
[03] 78^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ namaggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nahetuṃ namaggahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nahetuṃ ^a^V5.0412^ea^ namaggādhipatiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu maggādhipati dhammo ^a^T6.0412^ea^ uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 79^b^.^eb^ nahetu nauppanno dhammo hetussa uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... ārammaṇe nava.
[03] 80^b^.^eb^ nahetu napaccuppanno dhammo hetussa paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... ārammaṇe nava.
[03] 81^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ nātītārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nahetuṃ nānāgatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nahetuṃ napaccuppannārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] 82^b^.^eb^ nahetu ^a^M5.0365^ea^ nājjhatto dhammo hetussa ajjhattassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (saṃkhittaṃ.)... ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā upanissaye nava, purejāte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.
[03] nahetu ^a^V5.0413^ea^ nabahiddhā dhammo hetussa bahiddhā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (saṃkhittaṃ.)... ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā upanissaye nava, purejāte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.
[03] (ajjhattattiko ^a^T6.0413^ea^ na labbhati paṭiccavārādīsu.)
[03] 83^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ nājjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nahetuṃ nabahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi. (ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇaṃ natthi.)
[03] 84^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.
[03] nanahetuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.
[03] (nahetunānidassanasappaṭighamūlepi tīṇiyeva.)
[03] 85^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ nānidassanāppaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu anidassanāppaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] 86^b^.^eb^ nasahetukaṃ ^a^T6.0414^ea^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.
[03] nāhetukaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ. gaṇitakena tīṇi pañhā.
[03] (nasahetukanānidassanasappaṭighamūlepi tīṇiyeva.)
[03] nasahetukaṃ ^a^M5.0366^ea^ ^a^V5.0414^ea^ nānidassanāppaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko anidassanāppaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] (nahetusampayuttaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ sahetukadukasadisaṃ. tīṇi pañhā. hetusahetukaduke ca hetuhetusampayuttaduke ca pañhā no labbhati.)
[03] 87^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] nahetuṃ nāhetukaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ. gaṇitakena tīṇi.
[03] nahetuṃ ^a^T6.0415^ea^ nasahetukaṃ nānidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca... tīṇiyeva.
[03] nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ nānidassanāppaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko anidassanāppaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] 88^b^.^eb^ nāppaccayaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaccayo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] nāppaccayaṃ nānidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaccayo anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] (nāppaccayanānidassanāppaṭighamūlepi ekameva.) hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ...pe0... avigate ekaṃ.
[03] (nasaṅkhataṃ nasappaccayasadisaṃ.)
[03] 89^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanaṃ ^a^V5.0415^ea^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassano sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] nasanidassanaṃ ^a^M5.0367^ea^ nānidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassano anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ^a^T6.0416^ea^ ekaṃ.
[03] nasanidassanaṃ nānidassanāppaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassano anidassanāppaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] 90^b^.^eb^ nasappaṭighaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.
[03] nāppaṭighaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.
[03] nasappaṭighaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca nāppaṭighaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ. (sabbattha tīṇi.)
[03] nasappaṭighaṃ nānidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] nāppaṭighaṃ nānidassanāppaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho anidassanāppaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] 91^b^.^eb^ narūpiṃ ^a^V5.0416^ea^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpī sanidassanasappaṭigho ^a^T6.0417^ea^ dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] narūpiṃ nānidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpī anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nārūpiṃ nānidassanāppaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpī anidassanāppaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] 92^b^.^eb^ nalokiyaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.
[03] nalokuttaraṃ ^a^M5.0368^ea^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.
[03] (gaṇitakena gaṇetabbā tīṇi pañhā.)
[03] nalokiyaṃ nānidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo anidassanasappaṭigho... (tīṇiyeva pañhā kātabbā).
[03] nalokuttaraṃ nānidassanāppaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo anidassanāppaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.

[03] 93^b^.^eb^ nakenaci ^a^T6.0418^ea^ viññeyyaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nakenaci viññeyyaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kenaci naviññeyyo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nakenaci viññeyyaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo sanidassanasappaṭigho ^a^V5.0417^ea^ ca kenaci naviññeyyo sanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
[01] nakenaci naviññeyyaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca... tīṇiyeva.
[01] nakenaci viññeyyaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca nakenaci naviññeyyaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca... tīṇiyeva. (sabbattha nava.)
[01] nakenaci viññeyyaṃ nānidassanasappaṭighassa purimasadisaṃ navapañhaṃ kātabbaṃ. nakenaci viññeyyaṃ nānidassanāppaṭighamūlassa navapañhameva. hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava...pe0... avigate nava.
[03] 94^b^.^eb^ nāasavaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.
[03] nanoāsavaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ. gaṇitakena tīṇi.
[03] noāsavaṃ ^a^M5.0369^ea^ nānidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca... (purimanayena tīṇi pañhā).
[03] noāsavaṃ ^a^T6.0419^ea^ nānidassanāppaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo anidassanāppaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] 95^b^.^eb^ nasāsavaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.
[03] nānāsavaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ. gaṇitakena tīṇi.
[01] (nasāsavaṃ ^a^V5.0418^ea^ nānidassanasappaṭighamūlassa purimanayena tīṇi pañhā.)
[03] nānāsavaṃ nānidassanāppaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo anidassanāppaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] 96^b^.^eb^ nāasavasampayuttaṃ ^a^T6.0420^ea^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.
[01] nāasavavippayuttaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ. gaṇitakena tīṇi.
[01] (nāasavasampayuttanānidassanasappaṭighamūle tīṇiyeva.)
[03] nāasavasampayuttaṃ nānidassanāppaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto anidassanāppaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] 97^b^.^eb^ nāasavañceva nānāsavañca nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
[01] nānāsavañceva ^a^M5.0370^ea^ nano ca āsavaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... gaṇitakena tīṇi.
[01] (nāasavañceva nānāsavaṃ nānidassanasappaṭighamūlepi purimanayena tīṇiyeva.)
[01] nāasavañceva nānāsavañca nānidassanāppaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo anidassanāppaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] (āsavāasavasampayuttaduke pañhā na labbhati.)
[03] 98^b^.^eb^ āsavavippayuttaṃ ^a^V5.0419^ea^ nasāsavaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto ^a^T6.0421^ea^ sāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.
[01] āsavavippayuttaṃ nānāsavaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ. gaṇitakena tīṇi.
[01] (āsavavippayuttanasāsavanānidassanasappaṭighamūlepi purimanayeneva tīṇi pañhā.)
[03] āsavavippayuttaṃ nānāsavaṃ nānidassanāppaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo anidassanāppaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] 99^b^.^eb^ nosaññojanaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.... (tīṇi pañhā.)
[03] 100^b^.^eb^ noganthaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 101^b^.^eb^ nooghaṃ ^a^T6.0422^ea^ ^a^M5.0371^ea^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noogho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 102^b^.^eb^ noyogaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noyogo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 103^b^.^eb^ nonīvaraṇaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nonīvaraṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 104^b^.^eb^ noparāmāsaṃ ^a^V5.0420^ea^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noparāmāso sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 105^b^.^eb^ nasārammaṇaṃ ^a^T6.0423^ea^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anārammaṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.
[01] nānārammaṇaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anārammaṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ. gaṇitakena tīṇi.

[03] nasārammaṇaṃ nānidassanāppaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anārammaṇo anidassanāppaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] 106^b^.^eb^ nocittaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.
[03] nanocittaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ. gaṇitakena tīṇi.

[01] nasaraṇaṃ ^a^V5.0425^ea^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati nāarammaṇapaccayā... tīṇi. nahetuyā ekaṃ, nāarammaṇe tīṇi, nādhipatiyā tīṇi...pe0... novigate tīṇi.
[01] hetupaccayā nāarammaṇe tīṇi... nāarammaṇapaccayā hetuyā tīṇi.
[01] (sahajātavārampi paccayavārampi nissayavārampi saṃsaṭṭhavārampi sampayuttavārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)

[03] hetuyā dve, adhipatiyā dve...pe0... avigate tīṇi.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ nakusalaṃ ^a^T6.0433^ea^ ^a^M5.0377^ea^ ^a^V5.0426^ea^ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nakusalaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (2)
[03] nākusalaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nākusalaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (2)
[03] nābyākataṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nābyākataṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (2)

[03] nakusalaṃ nahetuñca nābyākataṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nākusalaṃ nahetuñca nābyākataṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nakusalaṃ nahetuñca nākusalaṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. tīṇi. [03] 2^b^.^eb^ nakusalaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nakusalaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nahetu dhammo ^a^M5.0378^ea^ uppajjati hetupaccayā. nakusalaṃ nanahetuṃ ^a^T6.0434^ea^ ^a^V5.0427^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo nahetu ca abyākato nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. tīṇi.

[01] nākusalaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nākusalaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nākusalaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo nahetu ca abyākato nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. tīṇi.

[01] nakusalaṃ nanahetuñca nābyākataṃ nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi.
[01] nākusalaṃ nanahetuñca nābyākataṃ nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ nakusalaṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nakusalaṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nākusalaṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nābyākataṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nakusalaṃ nasahetukañca nābyākataṃ nasahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nakusalaṃ nasahetukañca nākusalaṃ nasahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ^a^T6.0435^ea^ cha.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ nakusalaṃ nāhetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nākusalaṃ nāhetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ^a^V5.0428^ea^. nābyākataṃ ^a^M5.0379^ea^ nāhetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nakusalaṃ nāhetukañca nābyākataṃ nāhetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nākusalaṃ nāhetukañca nābyākataṃ nāhetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nakusalaṃ nāhetukañca nākusalaṃ nāhetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā cha.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ nakusalaṃ nahetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nakusalaṃ nahetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nākusalaṃ nahetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... cha. [03] 6^b^.^eb^ nakusalaṃ nahetuñceva nāhetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nakusalaṃ nahetuñceva nāhetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. dve.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ nakusalaṃ nonīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
[03] 27^b^.^eb^ nakusalaṃ ^a^M5.0383^ea^ noparāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
[03] 28^b^.^eb^ nakusalaṃ nasārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā...pe0....
[03] 29^b^.^eb^ nakusalaṃ ^a^T6.0442^ea^ nakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā pañca.
[03] nakusalaṃ nanakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 30^b^.^eb^ nakusalaṃ narūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato rūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nakusalaṃ nanarūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā pañca.
[03] 31^b^.^eb^ nakusalaṃ ^a^V5.0433^ea^ nārūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo arūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[03] nakusalaṃ nanārūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nārūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ^a^T6.0443^ea^ pañca.

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ nakusalaṃ napariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato pariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nākusalaṃ napariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato pariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nābyākataṃ napariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato pariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā pañca.

[03] nakusalaṃ ^a^M5.0384^ea^ nāpariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo apariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nakusalaṃ nāpariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā abyākato apariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. dve. (akusalamūle dve, dukamūle dve.)... hetuyā cha.
[03] 33^b^.^eb^ nakusalaṃ naniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo niyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] nakusalaṃ nāniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nābyākataṃ nāniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nākusalaṃ nāniyyānikañca nābyākataṃ nāniyyānikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 34^b^.^eb^ nakusalaṃ ^a^T6.0444^ea^ ^a^V5.0434^ea^ naniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo niyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... (apariyāpannasadisaṃ cha pañhā).

[03] nakusalaṃ nāniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nākusalaṃ nāniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nābyākataṃ nāniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nakusalaṃ nāniyatañca nābyākataṃ nāniyatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nākusalaṃ nāniyatañca nābyākataṃ nāniyatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā pañca.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ nakusalaṃ nasauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nākusalaṃ nasauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nābyākataṃ nasauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ^a^M5.0385^ea^ abyākato sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nākusalaṃ nasauttarañca nābyākataṃ nasauttarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nakusalaṃ nasauttarañca nākusalaṃ nasauttarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā pañca.
[03] nakusalaṃ nānuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo anuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... (saṃkhittaṃ.) hetuyā cha...pe0... vipāke tīṇi...pe0... avigate cha.
[03] 36^b^.^eb^ nakusalaṃ nasaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] nakusalaṃ ^a^T6.0445^ea^ nāraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nābyākataṃ ^a^V5.0435^ea^ nāraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nakusalaṃ nāraṇañca nābyākataṃ nāraṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. tīṇi.
[03] nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi.
[03] nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi.

[03] nasukhāya ^a^M5.0386^ea^ vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nahetuñca nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi (dutiyaṃ gaṇitakena tīṇi). hetuyā ^a^T6.0446^ea^ ekavīsa.
[03] nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... dve.
[01] nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca... (dve pañhāyeva).
[03] nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca... (dveyeva. paṭhamaṃ gaṇitakena ekaṃ, dutiyaṃ gaṇitakena ekaṃ, tatiyaṃ gaṇitakena ekaṃ kātabbaṃ.) hetuyā nava.

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ navipākaṃ ^a^V5.0436^ea^ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca vipāko hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. navipākaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca vipākadhammadhammo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. navipākaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. tīṇi.

[03] navipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca vipāko hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. navipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. dve.

[03] nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca vipāko hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca vipākadhammadhammo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. dve.
[03] navipākaṃ nahetuñca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca vipākadhammadhammo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.
[03] navipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuñca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca vipāko hetu dhammo ^a^T6.0447^ea^ uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.

[01] navipākaṃ nahetuñca navipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca vipāko hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. navipākaṃ nahetuñca navipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuñca ^a^M5.0387^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. dve. (saṃkhittaṃ.) hetuyā ekādasa.
[03] navipākaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca vipākadhammadhammo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā aṭṭhārasa. (saṃkhittaṃ.)
[03] 39^b^.^eb^ naupādinnupādāniyaṃ ^a^V5.0437^ea^ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] naupādinnupādāniyaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā aṭṭhārasa.
[03] 40^b^.^eb^ nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ ^a^T6.0448^ea^ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ napītisahagataṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā aṭṭhavīsa.
[03] 43^b^.^eb^ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] 44^b^.^eb^ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ^a^T6.0449^ea^ nava.
[03] 45^b^.^eb^ nāacayagāmiṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca apacayagāmī hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] 46^b^.^eb^ nasekkhaṃ ^a^M5.0388^ea^ ^a^V5.0438^ea^ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asekkho hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] 47^b^.^eb^ naparittaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca mahaggato hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ekādasa.
[03] 48^b^.^eb^ naparittārammaṇaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parittārammaṇo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā terasa.
[03] 49^b^.^eb^ nahīnaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca majjhimo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] 50^b^.^eb^ namicchattaniyataṃ ^a^T6.0450^ea^ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sammattaniyato hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] 51^b^.^eb^ namaggārammaṇaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggahetuko hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... (saṃkhittaṃ.) hetuyā dasa.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ nānuppanno nanahetu dhammo uppannassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. nauppādī nanahetu dhammo uppannassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. nānuppanno nanahetu ca nauppādī nanahetu ca dhammā uppannassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ nātīto nanahetu dhammo paccuppannassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. nānāgato nanahetu dhammo paccuppannassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. nātīto nanahetu ^a^V5.0439^ea^ ca nānāgato nanahetu ca dhammā paccuppannassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 54^b^.^eb^ nātītārammaṇaṃ ^a^M5.0389^ea^ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca atītārammaṇo hetu ^a^T6.0451^ea^ dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā sattarasa.
[03] 55^b^.^eb^ nājjhattaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
[01] nabahiddhā nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā dve.
[03] 56^b^.^eb^ nājjhattārammaṇaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... dve.
[03] nabahiddhārammaṇaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ ^a^T6.0452^ea^ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nānidassanasappaṭighaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nahetuñca nānidassanasappaṭighaṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā tīṇi.

[01] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (nahetu nanahetu ovattā, tīṇi mūlāni, ekavīsati pañhā kātabbā.)

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ ^a^V5.0440^ea^ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nānidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ^a^M5.0390^ea^. nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasahetukañca nānidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nāhetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... satta.
[03] nānidassanasappaṭighaṃ nāhetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... satta.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nāhetukañca nānidassanasappaṭighaṃ nāhetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... satta. hetuyā ekavīsa.
[03] 59^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nahetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ^a^T6.0453^ea^ tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nahetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho hetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ekavīsa.
[03] 60^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nahetuñceva nāhetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nāhetukañceva nana ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 61^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ ^a^V5.0441^ea^ nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[01] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ ^a^T6.0454^ea^ nahetuvippayuttañceva nana ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho hetusampayutto ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 62^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ ^a^M5.0391^ea^ nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nahetuṃ nāhetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ekavīsa.
[03] 63^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasappaccayo dhammo anidassanāppaṭighassa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (saṃkhittaṃ.) ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā upanissaye tīṇi.
[03] 64^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasanidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho sanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā pañca.

[03] nānidassanāppaṭigho nanasanidassano dhammo anidassanāppaṭighassa nasanidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (saṃkhittaṃ.) ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.
[03] 65^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ ^a^T6.0455^ea^ ^a^V5.0442^ea^ nāppaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 66^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ narūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ekavīsa.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nārūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho arūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 67^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... satta.
[03] nānidassanasappaṭighaṃ ^a^M5.0392^ea^ nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... satta. hetuyā ekavīsa.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nalokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanāppaṭigho lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (saṃkhittaṃ.) hetuyā tīṇi...pe0... avigate tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nalokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanāppaṭigho lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (saṃkhittaṃ.) hetuyā tīṇi...pe0... avigate tīṇi.
[03] 68^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ^a^T6.0456^ea^ pañcatiṃsa.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nanakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā pañcatiṃsa.
[03] 69^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ ^a^V5.0443^ea^ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nanoāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ekavīsa.
[03] 70^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ekavīsa.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ nakusalaṃ ^a^M5.0403^ea^ ^a^V5.0454^ea^ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nakusalaṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. dve.

[03] nābyākataṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nābyākataṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ ^a^T6.0475^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. dve.
[03] nakusalaṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca nābyākataṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.
[01] nākusalaṃ ^a^M5.0404^ea^ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca nābyākataṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ nakusalaṃ nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ nakusalaṃ nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo ^a^T6.0476^ea^ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nakusalaṃ nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. dve.

[03] nābyākataṃ nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nābyākataṃ nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. dve.

[03] nakusalaṃ nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca nābyākataṃ nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.

[03] nākusalaṃ ^a^M5.0405^ea^ ^a^V5.0356^ea^ nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca nābyākataṃ nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.

(cattāri gaṇitakena dve dve pañhā kātabbā.) hetuyā cuddasa.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ nasukhāya ^a^T6.0488^ea^ vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nākusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto akusalo ^a^V5.0464^ea^ dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nākusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekavīsa.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ navipākaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā vipākadhammadhammo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
