[03] nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ nākusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ^a^T6.0492^ea^ cha.
[03] nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ nābyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[03] 37^b^.^eb^ nāacayagāmiṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ācayagāmī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[03] nāacayagāmiṃ ^a^V5.0467^ea^ nākusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ācayagāmī akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nāacayagāmiṃ nābyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā pañca.
[03] 38^b^.^eb^ nasekkhaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sekkho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[01] nasekkhaṃ nākusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nevasekkhanāsekkho akusalo ^a^T6.0493^ea^ dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasekkhaṃ nābyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā pañca.
[03] 39^b^.^eb^ namahaggataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā mahaggato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā nava.
[03] namahaggataṃ ^a^M5.0415^ea^ nākusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā paritto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] naparittaṃ nābyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paritto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[03] 40^b^.^eb^ naparittārammaṇaṃ ^a^V5.0468^ea^ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā parittārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ekavīsa.
[03] naparittārammaṇaṃ ^a^T6.0494^ea^ nākusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā parittārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cuddasa.
[03] naparittārammaṇo nābyākato dhammo parittārammaṇassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (saṃkhittaṃ.)... ārammaṇe ekavīsa.
[03] 41^b^.^eb^ nahīnaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā majjhimo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[03] nahīnaṃ nākusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hīno akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nahīnaṃ nābyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca majjhimo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[03] 42^b^.^eb^ namicchattaniyataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sammattaniyato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[03] namicchattaniyataṃ nākusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā micchattaniyato akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[03] namicchattaniyataṃ ^a^T6.0495^ea^ nābyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[03] 43^b^.^eb^ namaggārammaṇaṃ ^a^M5.0416^ea^ ^a^V5.0469^ea^ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā maggārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā pañcatiṃsa. (nākusalaṃ nābyākataṃ natthi.)
[03] 44^b^.^eb^ nauppanno nakusalo dhammo uppannassa kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... ārammaṇe satta.
[03] nauppanno nākusalo dhammo uppannassa akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... ārammaṇe cha.
[03] nauppanno nābyākato dhammo uppannassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... ārammaṇe satta.
[03] (atītattikaṃ uppannattikasadisaṃ.)
[03] 45^b^.^eb^ nātītārammaṇaṃ ^a^T6.0496^ea^ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā atītārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ekavīsa.
[03] nātītārammaṇaṃ nākusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā atītārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ekavīsa.
[03] 46^b^.^eb^ nājjhattaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā bahiddhā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nabahiddhā nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhatto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā dve.

[03] nājjhattaṃ ^a^V5.0470^ea^ nākusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā bahiddhā akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nabahiddhā nākusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhatto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā dve.
[03] 47^b^.^eb^ nājjhattārammaṇaṃ ^a^M5.0417^ea^ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhattārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.
[03] nājjhattārammaṇaṃ ^a^T6.0497^ea^ nākusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhattārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cha.

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanāppaṭigho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nānidassanasappaṭighaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanāppaṭigho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nakusalañca nānidassanasappaṭighaṃ nakusalañca dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanāppaṭigho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nākusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanāppaṭigho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nābyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... satta.
[03] (nānidassanasappaṭighanābyākatamūlāni sattameva, dukamūlāni sattameva, sabbaṃ ekavīsatimeva.)

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ ^a^T6.0498^ea^ ^a^V5.0471^ea^ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nādukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 50^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ ^a^M5.0418^ea^ navipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ navipākadhammadhammaṃ paccayā anidassanāppaṭigho vipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ ^a^T6.0499^ea^ nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ekavīsa.
[03] 51^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭigho naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo anidassanāppaṭighassa upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... ārammaṇe cha.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ ^a^V5.0472^ea^ nānupādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ekavīsa.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nānupādinnānupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanāppaṭigho anupādinnānupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 52^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ ^a^T6.0500^ea^ nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanāppaṭigho saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nāsaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ekavīsa.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nāsaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanāppaṭigho asaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 53^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ ^a^M5.0419^ea^ nasavitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho savitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nāvitakkavicāramattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho avitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nāvitakkāvicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho avitakkāvicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ^a^T6.0501^ea^... hetuyā ekavīsa.
[03] 54^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ ^a^V5.0473^ea^ napītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 55^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanāppaṭigho dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ^a^T6.0502^ea^ tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanāppaṭigho bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ekavīsa.
[03] 56^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ ^a^M5.0420^ea^ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ ^a^V5.0474^ea^ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ ^a^T6.0503^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ekavīsa.
[03] 57^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nāacayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanāppaṭigho ācayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nāpacayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanāppaṭigho apacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nanevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ekavīsa.
[03] 58^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanāppaṭigho sekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nāsekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanāppaṭigho ^a^T6.0504^ea^ asekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ekavīsa.
[03] 59^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ ^a^M5.0421^ea^ ^a^V5.0475^ea^ naparittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho paritto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ekavīsa.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ namahaggataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho mahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nāppamāṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanāppaṭigho appamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 60^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naparittārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ^a^T6.0505^ea^... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ namahaggatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanāppaṭigho mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nāppamāṇārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanāppaṭigho appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 61^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nahīnaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanāppaṭigho hīno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ namajjhimaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ekavīsa.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ ^a^V5.0476^ea^ napaṇītaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanāppaṭigho paṇīto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 62^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ ^a^T6.0506^ea^ namicchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanāppaṭigho micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ ^a^M5.0422^ea^ nasammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanāppaṭigho sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nāniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ekavīsa.
[03] 63^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ namaggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanāppaṭigho maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ namaggahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanāppaṭigho maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ namaggādhipatiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanāppaṭigho maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā ^a^T6.0507^ea^ tīṇi.
[03] 64^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭigho nauppanno dhammo anidassanāppaṭighassa uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... ārammaṇe cha.
[03] 65^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭigho ^a^V5.0477^ea^ napaccuppanno dhammo anidassanāppaṭighassa paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... ārammaṇe cha.
[03] 66^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nātītārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nānāgatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanāppaṭigho anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ napaccuppannārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ^a^T6.0508^ea^... hetuyā tīṇi.

[03] 67^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭigho ^a^M5.0423^ea^ nājjhatto dhammo anidassanāppaṭighassa ajjhattassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (saṃkhittaṃ.) ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā cha, purejāte atthiyā avigate cha.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭigho nabahiddhā dhammo anidassanāppaṭighassa bahiddhā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (saṃkhittaṃ.) ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā cha, purejāte atthiyā avigate cha.
[03] 68^b^.^eb^ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nājjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ ^a^V5.0478^ea^ nabahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanāppaṭigho bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] (sahajātavārampi paccayavārampi nissayavārampi saṃsaṭṭhavārampi sampayuttavārampi pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)
[06] dhammapaccanīyānulome tikatikapaṭṭhānaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ ^a^M5.0425^ea^ ^a^V5.0479^ea^ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ^a^T6.0509^ea^ hetu sahetuko ca nahetu sahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. tīṇi.
[03] nanahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.
[03] hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri...pe0... avigate cattāri.
[03] 2^b^.^eb^ nanahetu nāhetuko dhammo nahetussa ahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
[03] hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe cha...pe0... avigate pañca. (pañhāvāraṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
[03] 3^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ nāhetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.
[01] nanahetuṃ ^a^M5.0426^ea^ nāhetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ.
[03] nahetuṃ nāhetukañca nanahetuṃ nāhetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. ekaṃ. hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 4^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ ^a^V5.0480^ea^ nahetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā cattāri.
[03] nahetuṃ nahetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu hetuvippayutto ^a^T6.0510^ea^ dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... hetuyā tīṇi.
[03] 5^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ nahetuñceva nāhetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] nanahetuṃ nāhetukañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] 6^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.
[03] nanahetuṃ nahetuvippayuttañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu hetusampayutto ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. hetuyā ekaṃ.

[01] nāraṇaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nāraṇaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. nāraṇaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo nahetu ca araṇo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā... tīṇi. (saṃkhittaṃ.)

[01] nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ. (saṃkhittaṃ.)

[03] 91^b^.^eb^ nasaraṇo ^a^V5.0497^ea^ nānuttaro dhammo araṇassa anuttarassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, upanissaye dve, purejāte ekaṃ, āsevane ekaṃ, vippayutte ekaṃ, atthiyā ekaṃ, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ.
